law.catch_line: Enforcement of lien and liability against vessel.
law.text: The lien given in KRS 376.360, and the liability provided for in KRS 376.370, may be enforced by attachment from the court having jurisdiction.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 2482.
